content: आख्या {c2c} <ab>P.</ab> {@--1@} ({%a%}) To tell, say, inform, communicate, narrate (usually with <ab>dat.</ab> of person); ते रामाय वधोपायमाचख्युर्विबुधद्विषः <ls>R. 15. 5</ls>, <ls n="R. 15.">41</ls>, <ls n="R. 15.">71</ls>, <ls n="R. 15.">93</ls>; <ls n="R.">12. 42</ls>, <ls n="R. 12.">91</ls>; <ls>Bg. 11. 31</ls>, <ls n="Bg.">18. 63</ls>; <ls>Me. 100</ls>; <ls>Ms. 8. 224</ls>, <ls n="Ms.">9. 73</ls>, <ls>Y. 1. 66</ls>, <ls n="Y.">2. 65</ls>; sometimes with <ab>gen.</ab> of person; आख्याहि भद्रे प्रियदर्शनस्य <ls>Pt. 4. 15</ls>; केनाहं तवाख्यातः <ls>Mb.</ls> ({%b%}) To declare, announce, signify; <ls>R. 2. 11.</ls> {@--2@} To call, denominate, name; सुवर्णबिंदुरित्याख्यायते <ls>Māl. 9</ls>; <ls>R. 10. 21</ls>, <ls>Ms. 4. 6.</ls> {@--3@} To look at, count; to recite (<ab>Ved.</ab>). {%--<ab>Caus.</ab>%} (ख्यापयति) {@--1@} To cause to tell or narrate. {@--2@} To declare.

आख्या [आ-ख्यायते अनेन; आख्या अङ्] A name, appellation; किं वा शकुंतलेत्यस्य मातुराख्या <ls>Ś. 7</ls>, <ls n="Ś.">7. 33</ls>; पश्चादुमाख्यां सुमुखी जगाम <ls>Ku. 1. 26</ls>; तदाख्यया भुवि पप्रथे <ls>R. 15. 101</ls> became known by that name; often at the end of compounds meaning ‘named’ or ‘called’; अथ किमाख्यस्य राजर्षेः सा धर्मपत्नी <ls>Ś. 7</ls>; रघुवंशाख्यं काव्यं &c.
